tion regarding the organisation and choice of officials. The NFA should ponder these questions. How come a referee from Niger State was ap- pointed to officiate in a match involv- ing Lagos and Benue states? Why was a referee who was only last year dropped from the FIFA rating list appointed? And lastly, why was a person who failed the last National Cooper test appointed as the centre- referee in a Challenge Cup final match? ALL-AFRICA GAMES '95 ALL-AFRICA GAMES '95
Five Companies Offer To Sponsor Nigeria Five Companies Offer To Sponsor Nigeria

Five companies have agreed to spnsor the Nigerian Contingent to the forthcoming; All-Africa Games in Harare, Zimbabwe in September the secretary of the Nigeria Olympic Committee (NOC), Mr. Elias Gora, has said. The companies are Union Bank Plc, Coca-Cola Bouling Company Plc, Nestle Food Nigeria Plc, Ashaka Cement Company and National Oil and Marketing Company Limited. Mr. Gora told the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN( in Lago on Tuesday that although the financial commit- ments to the companies were still unknown, they had promised to en- sure the welfare of the contiment.
